m_szDocSumamry: The Autowende Is Here: Electric Cars Are The Next Trillion Dollar Industry November 24th, 2015 by Guest Contributor   Originally published on Medium . By Michiel Langezaal In the next 60 months the automotive industry will see more change than in the last 60 years. European car manufacturers should commit to electric cars now or Europe will be in economic trouble Once in a while a new technology comes along that profoundly changes the way humans relate to energy and transport.
